author: makortel
body:
#### PR description:

Following https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/48703 this PR removes `SwitchProducerCUDA`. The next step will be to remove `SwitchProducer` and `ConditionalTask` from the framework itself.

Resolves https://github.com/cms-sw/framework-team/issues/1514

#### PR validation:

Unit tests run (on a CPU-only machine)
title: Remove SwitchProducerCUDA
